markdown.markdown: ::: {style="text-align: right;"} ::: **University of North Carolina** - *Chapel Hill, NC* \| *September 2023 - August 2027* - Bachelor of Science in Data Science and Bachelor of Science in Statistics & Analytics - GPA: 3.99/4.00 ## Coursework ### Major Coursework #### **Fall 2023** - MATH 233: Calculus of Functions of Several Variables - STOR 155: Introduction to Data Models and Inference #### **Spring 2024** - COMP 110: Introduction to Programming - MATH 381: Discrete Mathematics #### **Fall 2024** - COMP 210: Data Structures and Analysis - DATA 110: Introduction to Data Science - DATA 150: Communication for Data Scientists - MATH 347: Linear Algebra #### **Spring 2025** - DATA 120: Ethics of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence - STOR 320: Introduction to Data Science - STOR 415: Introduction to Optimization - STOR 535: Probability for Data Science #### **Fall 2025** - STOR 455: Methods of Data Analysis - STOR 555: Mathematical Statistics - STOR 565: Machine Learning ### Non-Major Coursework #### **Fall 2023** - ENGL 105: English Composition and Rhetoric - HIST 140: The World Since 1945 - IDST 130: The Future of Food - IDST 130L: Data Literacy Lab #### **Spring 2024** - ASIA 75: Love in China - ECON 101: Introduction to Economics #### **Fall 2024** - ENGL 138: Introduction to Creative Nonfiction #### **Spring 2025** - STOR 496: Undergraduate Reading and Research in Statistics and Operations Research #### **Fall 2025** - SOCI 101: Sociological Perspectives - STOR 290: Special Topics in Statistics and Operations Research
